thread.title: Sean Spicer Hates Dippin’ Dots and They Have Something To Say About That
thread.title_full: Sean Spicer Hates Dippin’ Dots and They Have Something To Say About That

author: Abby Heugel
title: Sean Spicer Hates Dippin’ Dots and They Have Something To Say About That
text:
Over 3 million people just like you 'Like' us » Like it? Share it! 144 Shares 
Donald Trump had his thing with Skittles, and it turns out his press secretary has quite the bizarre beef with the seemingly innocent futuristic dessert Dippin' Dots. Since 2010, Sean Spicer has been consistently tweeting his antipathy towards the Dippin' Dots, for a reason that has yet to be disclosed (no, these are not alternative facts .) Dippin dots is NOT the ice cream of the future — Sean Spicer (@seanspicer) April 8, 2010 After that first tweet, he was cool for about 17 months before resurfacing to once again drive the point home. I think I have said this before but Dippin Dots are notthe ice cream of the future — Sean Spicer (@seanspicer) September 22, 2011 He even gloated when the old Dippin' Dots went bankrupt, which is ironic seeing as who his boss is. Ice Cream of the Past: Dippin' Dots Files for Bankruptcy http://t.co/xPifdujD — Sean Spicer (@seanspicer) November 4, 2011 But wait! If he hates them so much, why was he trying to get some when out at a baseball game? Dippin' disappointment with a sprinkle of hypocrisy. If Dippin Dots was truly the ice cream of the future they would not have run out of vanilla cc @Nationals — Sean Spicer (@seanspicer) September 7, 2015 22 Words Rocks ...AND GETS ALL UP IN YOUR FACEBOOK More posts in #Bizarre
